comments.body:
this requires `package.json` to be added with the PR.
(from errors):
> 1> Cannot find module 'boxen' or its corresponding type declarations.

Adding dependency is OK, as the `update-notifier` depends on `boxen`
> When you add a package.json to dependents of foo, you will also need to open a PR to add foo to dependenciesWhitelist.txt in types-publisher.

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#how-can-i-contribute

IMO the boxen is not whitelisted, you will have to make related PR

Awesome, thanks, I'll look into it! Apologies for the dumb mistakes, DefinitelyTyped noob here!

Out of curiosity, do you know why `configstore` below didn't need a `package.json`?

Oh I think that'd be it:

> A package.json may be included to specify dependencies that are not other `@types` packages.

From https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-notice-some-packages-having-a-packagejson-here

`configstore` is a `@types` package: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/configstore/index.d.ts
